info.name: [SD] Bulk import custom field values (list)
info.description:
This collection will import values from a .csv to a list type custom field

Author: Hern√°n Aranda (a.k.a. Hernium)

# Prerequisites

Check this article to prepare everything you need: [https://github.com/hernan-aranda/invgate-implementor-toolbox#how-to-use-this-resources](https://github.com/hernan-aranda/invgate-implementor-toolbox#how-to-use-this-resources)

# Template

| **Column** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| itemName | Required. Name of the list item to be created. |

Source: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10cN2GcwdoPv8x8-5K6YKi1zdxbbaGsW_IWTTL9CuGnY/view#gid=0](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10cN2GcwdoPv8x8-5K6YKi1zdxbbaGsW_IWTTL9CuGnY/view#gid=0)

# Execution

1. Create list type custom field and get the ID
2. Set and select the enviroment, or replace the enviroment variables with your constants
3. Set the collection variable "_fieldId_" with the the custom field ID
4. Create the .csv file
5. Run the collection using the .csv file
    

# Requests

query.description: Constant. This is the only possible value for now
Variable. You get this value from de .csv
Constant. Set this fieldId in the Collection Variables tab

request.description:
Creates the item in the list.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldoptionslist-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldoptionslist-POST)

exec: // If we got a 200, the request was executed succesfully
